title: Research Topic: China's 996.ICU Movement: 240,000+ GitHub Stars Before Censorship (2019)
summary: Based on the research priority 'China's 996.ICU Movement: 240,000+ GitHub Stars Before Censorship (2019)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document China's 996.ICU movement protesting brutal 9am-9pm, 6-day work weeks, which garnered over 240,000 GitHub stars before authorities censored it, and its connection to international tech worker ... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
